name: Bike Parts Co.(full stack project)
b_point1: Bike Parts Co. is fully responsive in desktop and mobile devices with tailwind css.
b_point3: There is a lot of functionality in this website based on authentication(with firebase) and authorization level.
Technology: React js, React-Router-dom, React Query, React Hook Form, TailwindCSS, DaisyUI, NodeJS, ExpressJS, MongoDB, Firebase, Heroku.
description: Bike Parts Co. is a fantastic site where you can see a world famous Parts collection. Bike Parts Co. is fully responsive and dynamic.

name: Dream Auto Warehouse (full stack project)
b_point1: Dream Auto Warehouse is fully responsive in desktop and mobile devices with custom css.
b_point2: use the mongodb database to store all data.
b_point3: use firebase and react-firebase-hooks to develop authentication system
Technology: React js, React-Router-dom, react icon, NodeJS, ExpressJS, MongoDB,Firebase, Heroku
description: Dream Auto Warehouse is a fantastic site where you can see and purchase world famous car collections.

name: Wedding Photographer
b_point1: use firebase and react-firebase-hooks to develop authentication system
b_point2: home page including banner, services, packages, footer
b_point3: dynamic route implemented very nicely in this project
Technology: React js, React-Router-dom, react toast, react bootstrap, Firebase react icon, etc.
description: Wedding photographers are fully responsive on desktop and mobile devices with custom css and bootstrap .
